short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a panel to quickly copy emojis to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds icon to toolbar with all emojis (Unicode 14.0) separated by category.
Emojis are copied to clipboard by pressing on one of them.

Emoji assets in SVG format provided by Twemoji licensed under CC-BY 4.0.
